item.title: Data Engineering Youtube Channels You Should Follow
item.description: I have been following several Youtube channels that often cover different topics in Data Engineering, ranging from new tools to organization wide practices. I am compiling this list for my own reference and also for sharing with my peers: Seattle Data Guy - YouTube Lander Analytics - YouTube Bloggers to follow: https://medium.com/@thehippieandtheboss
item.content:
I have been following several Youtube channels that often cover different topics in Data Engineering, ranging from new tools to organization wide practices. I am compiling this list for my own reference and also for sharing with my peers:

  • Seattle Data Guy - YouTube
  • Lander Analytics - YouTube

Bloggers to follow: https://medium.com/@thehippieandtheboss
